cause.description:
The American Cancer Society is a Nationwide community-based voluntary health organization.
Relay for Life is the American Cancer Society’s signature fundraising event.
Currently over one million people get cancer each year. Nearly half of all men and a little over one third of all women in the United States will develop cancer during their lifetimes.
Working with ACS is one of the most powerful ways you can help to fight this devastating disease.
Become a part of the Relay For Life legacy!
1. Find a cure for cancer
2. Prevent Cancer
3. Treat Cancer
cause.mission: eliminating cancer as a major health problem by preventing cancer, saving lives and diminishing suffering from cancer, through research, education, advocacy, and service.
cause.name: Relay for Life -- Athens
